column4: is there any common issue resulting in a laptop shutting down without warning? it seems like it's overheating, but lmsensors isnt showing abnormal temperatures
I even ran double HDmovies to try andmake it overheat, and nothing happened. It wenbt from 36 to 51 degrees, and nothing
I will try and run it without the battery connected. It seems to have helped others with dodgy laptops
